companies.useCase: B2C Ecommerce (Buy Online, Pickup in Store)

quotes.text: “[Algolia] helps our customers find what they are looking for faster in a catalog of thousands of items, without business team intervention. Additionally, we’re using custom rules to apply marketing banners and visual filtering to help our customers reduce clicks, find what they are looking for faster, and find value.”
quotes.speaker: Shelby Sharp
quotes.title: Director of Digital Experience

quotes.text: “We knew we had an opportunity to improve conversion as we looked across our competition, but our prior search provider didn’t give us many levers to pull when we needed to take action or react.”
quotes.speaker: Shelby Sharp
quotes.title: Director of Digital Experience

quotes.text: “Algolia was growing credibility in the market, and we were intrigued by the AI (artificial intelligence) offering,”
quotes.speaker: Shelby Sharp
quotes.title: Director of Digital Experience

quotes.text: The reasons for selecting Algolia didn’t stop at curiosity. Sharp adds that Algolia provided: “ease of implementation, time to market, data security and privacy, and a dashboard that was intuitive for the business users – giving us the power to iterate without development always being the bottleneck.”
quotes.speaker: Shelby Sharp
quotes.title: Director of Digital Experience

quotes.text: “For us, search and discovery have to be tailored locally. Our partnership with Algolia allows us to provide real-time transparency to our shoppers for in-stock items available locally — and that will help drive digitally-initiated retail searches into local purchases.”
quotes.speaker: Shelby Sharp
quotes.title: Director of Digital Experience

quotes.text: “Using Algolia’s dashboard, we have implemented AI Reranking and Personalization, which use customer patterns to improve our customer experience in real-time,” Sharp says. “Our search algorithm is using feedback from our customers — what they are clicking on, what they are buying — to promote those items to the top of our results.”
quotes.speaker: Shelby Sharp
quotes.title: Director of Digital Experience

quotes.text: “This helps our customers find what they are looking for faster in a catalog of thousands of items, without business team intervention,” she adds. “Additionally, we’re using custom rules to apply marketing banners and visual filtering to help our customers reduce clicks, find what they are looking for faster, and find value.”
quotes.speaker: Shelby Sharp
quotes.title: Director of Digital Experience

quotes.text: “Rolling out new services has been a partnership, based on our customer data and success metrics defined at the start,” Sharp says, adding that her team and Algolia review performance metrics quarterly and develop a roadmap for future service rollouts. “Algolia listens to the Walgreens strategy and refines their technology roadmap with our input.”
quotes.speaker: Shelby Sharp
quotes.title: Director of Digital Experience

quotes.text: “It really feels like a partnership, especially with the support of our Algolia customer success team.”
quotes.speaker: Shelby Sharp
quotes.title: Director of Digital Experience

quotes.text: "With Algolia, we now build complex search features in months instead of years."
quotes.speaker: Anton Halim
quotes.title: Engineer

quotes.text: “As the digital space shifts, we know customers aren’t spending as much time on the site. Our goal is to remove as much friction as possible in their journey. Algolia is a great partner for us in that endeavor."
quotes.speaker: Rachel Maxwell
quotes.title: Senior Manager, Digital Merchandising

quotes.text: “A lot of our tech stack is homegrown. As we grow, we’ve had to outsource specific aspects and functions of the site. We look for industry leaders to help us maximize results. Obviously maximizing search and discoverability was very important to us. That’s what led us to Algolia.”
quotes.speaker: Rachel Maxwell
quotes.title: Senior Manager, Digital Merchandising

quotes.text: “Being a small team, we don’t always have the resources to focus on every aspect of the site. Algolia has really allowed us to optimize internal search. Customers who search are converting at a much higher rate – it’s a huge opportunity for the site. Having a partner who can help us nail that strategy is extremely valuable to us as a business.”
quotes.speaker: Rachel Maxwell
quotes.title: Senior Manager, Digital Merchandising

quotes.text: “We got better results, enjoyed a higher ROI, and saw less work for a very small team with limited resources,” Maxwell says. “It was a home run for us across the board.”
quotes.speaker: Rachel Maxwell
quotes.title: Senior Manager, Digital Merchandising

quotes.text: “When it comes to search, our biggest roadblock is product data. That’s not on the Algolia side,” Maxwell explains. “Previously, our engineering team had to do a fair amount of cleanup and implementation on our end to get product data to feed through in the best, most efficient way.” With NeuralSearch, the roadblock was effortlessly cleared. “We didn’t have to do anything. It was literally flipping a switch.”
quotes.speaker: Rachel Maxwell
quotes.title: Senior Manager, Digital Merchandising

quotes.text: “With NeuralSearch, maintaining synonym tables is removed from our responsibility. That frees up time and resources to devote to merchandising – and not at the expense of search.”
quotes.speaker: Rachel Maxwell
quotes.title: Senior Manager, Digital Merchandising

quotes.text: “It allowed us to test the waters, discover what kind of results we might reap.” In addition to the ease of implementation, the improvement in results was considerable. Everlane has seen their no results rate decrease by 45%. Their conversion rate is also up by 5%, and their click through rate increased over 8%. “It always helps to have that ROI in your back pocket when you approach leadership looking for an additional spend.”
quotes.speaker: Rachel Maxwell
quotes.title: Senior Manager, Digital Merchandising

quotes.text: "We chose Algolia Recommend because of the ease of integration. We were already primed with search insights data."
quotes.speaker: Jack Barnfield
quotes.title: Web Design & Optimisation Manager

quotes.text: "Algolia Recommend brings value to our business and visitor experience because it provides better alternative product suggestions which we proved were 60% more attractive to the customer, increasing conversion rates."
quotes.speaker: Jack Barnfield
quotes.title: Web Design & Optimisation Manager

quotes.text: "Since implementing Algolia Recommend, we have seen a 60% increase in similar product interaction, an 0.8% increase in conversion and a 1% per session value increase."
quotes.speaker: Jack Barnfield
quotes.title: Web Design & Optimisation Manager

quotes.text: "In my personal experience, when I’ve been in touch with the Algolia Community team, I have received a lot of good advice from the Algolia team in regards to InstantSearch. Always quick, friendly, and even through DM when I couldn’t share publicly part of the source code."
quotes.speaker: Robert Ster
quotes.title: Web Designer / UX/UI Developer

quotes.text: "I believe we continue to use Algolia because it offers a high value for our company and we rely a lot on Algolia to offer a better search experience to our user database."
quotes.speaker: Robert Ster
quotes.title: Web Designer / UX/UI Developer

quotes.text: "Personally, I have been using Algolia community forum and I’ve been in touch with Algolia developers who helped me a lot of time during developing some features. They have always been very helpful and understandable."
quotes.speaker: Robert Ster
quotes.title: Web Designer / UX/UI Developer

quotes.text: "Yes, I would recommend Algolia... Why? This is a very simple answer – as it offers a big value for everyone. More people should try it and implement it within their projects like blogs, shops, or even museum websites to have more user experience tailored search functionality."
quotes.speaker: Robert Ster
quotes.title: Web Designer / UX/UI Developer

quotes.text:
"Algolia offers high value at my company, I found that it may have a high value for other industries.

From a small blog or other small type companies to big ones, Algolia allows you to put anything into the Algolia DB, create fully customized search functionality, and offer customers or user databases an improved search experience. This doesn’t limit people to products, but also allows them to create databases with hobby items, blog posts, and more.

Just need to let your imagination free."
quotes.speaker: Robert Ster
quotes.title: Web Designer / UX/UI Developer

quotes.text: "We chose Algolia Recommend because we wanted to have relevant and reliable recommendations on our product pages, promoting the items a user might be most interested in."
quotes.speaker: Kristina Christova
quotes.title: Insights Analyst

quotes.text: "Thanks to Algolia Recommend, we are seeing higher engagement with our recommendations and increased performance for our new product lines which has resulted in 150% increase in click-through rates on mobile."
quotes.speaker: Kristina Christova
quotes.title: Insights Analyst

quotes.text: "[With Algolia] Merchandising has gone from a heavily manual process to basically set and forget.”
quotes.speaker: Ben Pusey

quotes.text: "Algolia’s comitment to headless, API first approach means we can decouple search. We’re not limited to web, we’ve been able to integrate it with native mobile apps and potentially other channels in the future."
quotes.speaker: Ben Pusey
quotes.title: Software Product Owner

quotes.text: “We don’t have to do very much with Algolia Recommend. With our previous solution, there was so much manual configuration, and there were an awful lot of times when it required constant upkeep when making changes. With Algolia we don’t need to do half of the things we previously did.”
quotes.speaker: Ben Pusey
quotes.title: Software Product Owner

quotes.text: “This [order rates on mobile increasing by an astounding 150 percent] is massive in terms of users actually interacting with as many products as possible... We’re confident that Algolia is recommending more relevant results and we’re seeing performance increases because of that.”
quotes.speaker: Kristina Christova
quotes.title: Insights Analyst

quotes.text: “Algolia Recommend and related products worked really well on the product pages… the impact on our Black Friday sales has been significant.”
quotes.speaker: Ben Pusey
quotes.title: Software Product Owner

companies.industry: high end online marketplace / auction platform (gemstones and collectibles)

quotes.text: "It's the ability to handle huge data sets and narrow them down really quickly. That's where the value of Algolia comes in."
quotes.speaker: Ross Sedawie
quotes.title: COO

quotes.text: "Then Algolia came along and could do everything we were looking to do and could do it in like 3 milliseconds. Brilliant!"
quotes.speaker: Ross Sedawie
quotes.title: COO

quotes.text: “For us, Personalization was an amazing feature,” Ross says. “And because we’re auction-based, people must register to bid, which makes using Personalization super easy for us. The ratio between anonymous user versus logged-in skews heavily on the logged-in side.”
quotes.speaker: Ross Sedawie
quotes.title: COO

quotes.text: “It’s so fast. A customer can whittle a search down from hundreds of items down to a couple of dozen almost immediately with just one text entry.”
quotes.speaker: Ross Sedawie
quotes.title: COO

quotes.text: “You know, people don’t have much time anymore. If you take, for example, one of our customers is a jeweler. They know what they have in mind. They need to go and find, say, an oval-shaped sapphire that’s seven-by-five. They know exactly what they need, and the specifications they need, and can literally come to the website and can find it with just one or two clicks, thanks to Algolia. It's the ability to handle huge data sets and narrow them down really quickly. That’s where the value of Algolia comes in.”
quotes.speaker: Ross Sedawie
quotes.title: COO

quotes.text: Algolia, he says, has helped enable different modes of discovery on the website: from categories, broad searches, fine searches, or through selecting specific facets and filters. “So now we are able to allow customers who want to find things in different ways to really dictate how they navigate the website, which is really cool.”
quotes.speaker: Ross Sedawie
quotes.title: COO

quotes.text: The use of Search and customer engagement are climbing as well. Since implementing Algolia, it has seen average session durations increase by nearly one-third (32 percent), while individual item views have increased by 16 percent — showcasing the ease customers have found more relevant items from their searches.
quotes.speaker: Ross Sedawie
quotes.title: COO

quotes.text: “Because of our re-platforming to BigCommerce and our unique multifaceted needs, Algolia came highly recommended. And, while it wasn’t true plug-and-play, it was very straightforward. We had a lot to move over to Algolia and it was pretty seamless. Its integration with BigCommerce is great.”
quotes.speaker: Joel Harrington
quotes.title: Senior Director of Demand & CX

quotes.text: “One of the big things that sets Revival apart is we have a vast number of professional articles that help breeders and rescue shelters with all kinds of health needs,” Harrington notes. “If you go to our learning center, it’s still a site search being powered by Algolia, but it’s a site search utilizing articles and the content pieces.”
quotes.speaker: Joel Harrington
quotes.title: Senior Director of Demand & CX

quotes.text: The seamless integration of Algolia and BigCommerce was another important factor in the decision to move to the new search solution, Harrington notes. “Even if we had not had the problems with the previous provider, we probably still would have switched because I’m not even sure if they would have worked in our new environment.”
quotes.speaker: Joel Harrington
quotes.title: Senior Director of Demand & CX

quotes.text: “It works great,” Harrington says of the integration. He continues, “The speed of Algolia is really, really good. Since launch, we’ve had no technical hurdles in terms of downtime or issues. Mainly time on our end has been spent on fine-tuning search results and things.”
quotes.speaker: Joel Harrington
quotes.title: Senior Director of Demand & CX

quotes.text: “It works great,” Harrington says of the integration. He continues, “The speed of Algolia is really, really good. Since launch, we’ve had no technical hurdles in terms of downtime or issues. Mainly time on our end has been spent on fine-tuning search results and things.”
quotes.speaker: Joel Harrington
quotes.title: Senior Director of Demand & CX

quotes.text: “That’s actually really good because we were trending slightly down,” Harrington says. “Algolia certainly plays a part in that upswing.”
quotes.speaker: Joel Harrington
quotes.title: Senior Director of Demand & CX

quotes.text: We used SLI for about 8 years prior to Algolia and Aloglia is far more sophisticated in terms of Typo Tolerance, Synonyms and AI capabilities. It also allows for much easier global rule setting so that we can easily promote our Proprietary Brands.
quotes.speaker: Joel Harrington
quotes.title: Sr Director of Demand & CX

quotes.text: “The vast majority of our traffic comes from search, so ensuring the site is quick — quick to load — and has all the key metrics ticked off from Google’s perspective is important. And we’ve seen a big improvement from using Algolia.”
quotes.speaker: Ed Swain
quotes.title: Director

quotes.text: “Algolia allows us to focus on and refine search speed and relevance a lot more.”
quotes.speaker: Dan Judd
quotes.title: Head of Digital

quotes.text: “The vast majority of our traffic comes from search, so ensuring the site is quick — quick to load — and has all the key metrics ticked off from Google’s perspective is important. And we’ve seen a big improvement from using Algolia,”
quotes.speaker: Ed Swain
quotes.title: Director

quotes.text: “From a marketing side, we work very closely with the brands that we sell, and they regularly put on promotions for their products, and with Algolia we can boost their product ranges to get the best return on investment.”
quotes.speaker: Dan Judd
quotes.title: Head of Digital

quotes.text: “For example, we have over 2,500 e-liquids, so being able to personalize the results for customers is a huge bonus,” Judd says. “There are so many different flavors, and we’re able to meet a specific customer’s tastes.”
quotes.speaker: Dan Judd
quotes.title: Head of Digital

quotes.text: “It allows us to make more informed decisions,” Swain says. “That’s something we’ve just started playing with, but we are already starting to see where we can tweak and adjust and amend things to improve our offering.”
quotes.speaker: Ed Swain
quotes.title: Director

quotes.text: “We see it as a partnership, as opposed to a software purchase,” Swain says. “You can go out and buy any number of different types of software but by working in partnership with Algolia, there’s more interest in us being successful.”
quotes.speaker: Ed Swain
quotes.title: Director

quotes.text: “Simplicity is a fundamental focus for Zeeman. It is also a strength of Algolia, which has allowed us to improve the performance and stability of Search and implement the value of simplicity into our platform and the customer experience.”
quotes.speaker: Alex Bloemendal
quotes.title: Manager eCommerce

quotes.text: “And the real fix was to replace the search solution with an external one that was scalable in the cloud, and we did a review of the market, which included Algolia.”
quotes.speaker: Alex Bloemendal
quotes.title: Manager eCommerce

quotes.text: The Algolia implementation met the company’s need for deployment speed: “Two weeks after signing the minimum viable product (MVP) was already ready to go live,” Bloemendal says. “That’s one of the successes of Algolia, together with our system integrator, Kega, and my team.”
quotes.speaker: Alex Bloemendal
quotes.title: Manager eCommerce

quotes.text: “We were so happy that we investigated ways to improve on Search and use more services from Algolia,” Bloemendal says. “That is the strength of Algolia, the ability to provide us with a solid roadmap. It allows us to innovate iteratively on our platform, the way an e-commerce company should.”
quotes.speaker: Alex Bloemendal
quotes.title: Manager eCommerce

quotes.text: Through testing, Zeeman determined that a small layout change around the placement of its search bar resulted in a notable uptick in conversions and more traffic using search than merely browsing. “We were able to do this because we have Algolia, we were not able with our previous solution,” Bloemendal says.
quotes.speaker: Alex Bloemendal
quotes.title: Manager eCommerce

quotes.text: “With Algolia you don’t need a lot of knowledge or people to use Search in a smart way.”
quotes.speaker: Alex Bloemendal
quotes.title: Manager eCommerce

quotes.text: “Algolia really excels at speed and performance. Consumers expect search to be blazing fast. Not only are speed and performance table stakes, but we’ve also expanded our user base across the globe. Delivering an accelerated, worldwide experience is something that’s been really easy to do using Algolia.”
quotes.speaker: Sydney Cho
quotes.title: Senior Product Manager

quotes.text: “Algolia really excels at speed and performance. Consumers expect search to be blazing fast,” Cho says Not only are speed and performance table stakes, but we’ve also significantly expanded our user base across the globe.”
quotes.speaker: Sydney Cho
quotes.title: Senior Product Manager

quotes.text: “It’s an innately fast service, and any time you build something externally you must worry about speed and performance — it’s something you can’t control. If our cloud or internet host goes down, we’re put into a tough position. But we’ve never had to worry about Algolia; it’s been fast and reliable partner.”
quotes.speaker: Sydney Cho
quotes.title: Senior Product Manager

quotes.text: “Delivering an accelerated, worldwide experience is something that’s been really easy to do using Algolia.”
quotes.speaker: Sydney Cho
quotes.title: Senior Product Manager

quotes.text: “We work with so many partners, and Algolia really stands out in that respect.” The two companies now have a more than eight-year relationship to show for it. AllTrails is an active part of Algolia’s customer advisory board, providing feedback and product requests.”
quotes.speaker: Sydney Cho
quotes.title: Senior Product Manager

quotes.text: “What’s nice about Algolia is that I can change the ranking algorithm and the UI without needing developer help,” Cho says. “Or, I can implement various rules. For example, ‘if the user types in YOSEM, the search function will always pin Yosemite National Park to the first ranked result.’ Those are things I can implement and see in action quickly.”
quotes.speaker: Sydney Cho
quotes.title: Senior Product Manager

quotes.text: “Now we have hands-on control of the look and feel of those search results and for a company like ours, where we put a lot of pride into how the website looks and feels… and want to have, as best we can, a consistent user experience across different areas of the site. That was very important for us.”
quotes.speaker: Mike Hoefer
quotes.title: Director of Web Development

quotes.text: “We now have total control over the look and feel of our search results. With our previous tool, we were really restricted to working within some boundaries and couldn’t do the development ourselves… We were reliant on other people for the interface development.”
quotes.speaker: Mike Hoefer
quotes.title: Director of Web Development

quotes.text: “Both platforms really allow us to do what we want to do with top-notch technology behind them. And we know we’ll always be able to grow and improve our customer experience online with the tools and toolset that they both provide.”
quotes.speaker: Mike Hoefer
quotes.title: Director of Web Development

quotes.text: “By detangling or separating Search from the application itself, we have some flexibility to do things with our platforms that we might not otherwise. So, if we decide to change our CMS, we can do that without impacting Search; if we decide to change our e-commerce platform, we can do that without impacting Search.”
quotes.speaker: Mike Hoefer
quotes.title: Director of Web Development

quotes.text: “We just looked at the suggestions it was making in terms of the popularity of products on a results page, and it would boost the ones getting more clicks or better priced for us, more popular with our customers. It really helped us ensure search was really relevant for our customers when they were searching during our busy holiday period.”
quotes.speaker: Mike Hoefer
quotes.title: Director of Web Development

quotes.text: “The auto synonym tool really helps us to discover the words our customers are using to search for products and make sure we are serving them the relevant results.”
quotes.speaker: Mike Hoefer
quotes.title: Director of Web Development

quotes.text: “The partnership with Algolia lets us leverage its feature set to achieve our goals. Algolia iterates and improves search, while we can focus on what truly differentiates our customer experience.”
quotes.speaker: Kit Ulrich & Matt Goorley
quotes.title: General Manager & Engineering Manager

quotes.text: “The data and the content available within our ecosystem are what differentiates us from any other marketplace out there, so it’s important to be able to make it all searchable and put relevant results in front of users.”
quotes.speaker: Matt Goorley
quotes.title: Engineering Manager

quotes.text: “We decided to switch to Algolia because we wanted to provide a better experience for what differentiates us, which is the content and the data around the content that users search for on our platform,” says Matt Goorley, Engineering Manager at LTK. “We’re a unique marketplace, so we have a unique user interaction with Search. By using some of the features that Algolia was offering, we were able to move quickly and efficiently to implement a better experience for all of our users.”
quotes.speaker: Matt Goorley
quotes.title: Engineering Manager

quotes.text: “We get support as we build, and the amount of effort it takes to implement is much less than it would be for us to build from scratch; it allows us to move faster.”
quotes.speaker: Matt Goorley
quotes.title: Engineering Manager

quotes.text: “The API and SDK options are really great, and the ability to handle traffic at scale. We have a high volume and Algolia is very fast — able to keep up with our level of traffic,”
quotes.speaker: Matt Goorley
quotes.title: Engineering Manager

quotes.text: “Algolia iterates and improves search and discovery, while we can focus on what truly differentiates our customer experience.”
quotes.speaker: Kit Ulrich
quotes.title: General Manager

quotes.text: “The Algolia search feature is a fundamental part of the foundation for many of the experiences that we're investing in now and that we're planning for in the future. And working with the Algolia team has been a smooth ride. We don’t have issues we need to escalate and that itself is a differentiator.”
quotes.speaker: Tal Ball
quotes.title: Global CTO

quotes.text:
“We were spending most of our engineering bandwidth on the ‘care and feeding’ of search, since we were managing it ourselves. And that didn’t allow for enough focus on the actual consumer experiences we were trying to create,” Ball says.
“By moving up the stack to Algolia, we were able to redirect those engineering efforts into things that were much more impactful from a consumer standpoint.”
quotes.speaker: Tal Ball
quotes.title: Global CTO

quotes.text: “One of the things that caused Algolia to stand out in that process was that it was very easy. It's kind of an over-the-weekend kind of concept of playing with it and coming in the next morning and feeling like we had a pretty good handle on how it was going to work, and how it was going to fit with the rest of our stack.”
quotes.speaker: Tal Ball
quotes.title: Global CTO

quotes.text: “Algolia enabled us to redirect our team that was on search in such a way that they could develop really compelling consumer experiences as opposed to just working on the blocking and tackling for basic search.”
quotes.speaker: Tal Ball
quotes.title: Global CTO

quotes.text: “There can be an overwhelming amount of content to get through, and a lot of different choices the consumer would need to work through. With Algolia, we were able to structure the journey of making those choices in a way that hopefully will feel natural and easy to the consumer and avoid overwhelming them with too many things to think about or choose between.”
quotes.speaker: Tal Ball
quotes.title: Global CTO

quotes.text: “The result was great, and solved the problem at the time, which was to have a working search and a fast search. Algolia nailed it. We went from less than 5 percent of people using search to about 15 to 20 percent. That's a huge jump. ANd we get fewer complaints from the CX team."
quotes.speaker: Steve Jiang
quotes.title: Head of Front-end Engineering

quotes.text: “If you walk into the bricks-and-mortar store and need something, you’d never be able to find it as fast as you could online,” he says. “We’ve had a lot of feedback where the customer has — while in the store or being helped by sales on their phone — been able to quickly find what they are looking for online.”
quotes.speaker: Steve Jiang
quotes.title: Head of Front-end Engineering

quotes.text: But perhaps the biggest benefit is that experienced by the customers, which can be seen in the increases Culture Kings has seen in its KPIs. Ninety percent of customers are able to get their search results in less than 50 milliseconds; 99 percent in under 100 milliseconds. “I’ve tested many other platforms, and search speed like that is unheard of.”
quotes.speaker: Steve Jiang
quotes.title: Head of Front-end Engineering

quotes.text: "We were constantly getting held back by Nosto, and even though recommendations were buried quite deep, you’d be surprised how many people would scroll down to them and just wait there,”
quotes.speaker: Steve Jiang
quotes.title: Head of Front-end Engineering

quotes.text: “And for some of our hyped products, we want recommendations to come higher, and that created a significant gap. Having Algolia be able to instantly show recommendations is a blessing.”
quotes.speaker: Steve Jiang
quotes.title: Head of Front-end Engineering

quotes.text: “After deploying Algolia, there’s less reliance on developer intervention to do everything that the business wants to do, and what the business is actually capable of doing is way beyond what they thought was possible in the old world.”
quotes.speaker: Tovi Heilbronn
quotes.title: Director of Digital Products & Experience

quotes.text: “Before we had Algolia, merchandising on our e-Commerce site was incredibly difficult. It required a lot of developer intervention and parts of code that were hard to handle, and business users could not create a good search experience,”
quotes.speaker: Tovi Heilbronn
quotes.title: Director of Digital Products & Experience

quotes.text: “Algolia puts business users in the driver’s seat to deliver experiences we only ever — in the Hybris days — aspired to,” Heilbronn says. “There wasn’t a sense of enablement, whereas now you can look at results and understand why a product is ranked how it is.”
quotes.speaker: Tovi Heilbronn
quotes.title: Director of Digital Products & Experience

quotes.text: “The people we’ve had the privilege of interacting with since the procurement phase and beyond have been very sharp; they know their product, they care, and they follow up.”
quotes.speaker: Tovi Heilbronn
quotes.title: Director of Digital Products & Experience

quotes.text: “There are vendors and there are partners, and there is a meaningful difference,” Heilbronn says. “Partners, like Algolia, are those whom I feel are almost co-invested in our success.”
quotes.speaker: Tovi Heilbronn
quotes.title: Director of Digital Products & Experience

quotes.text: “After saying enough was enough with OpenSearch, we quickly made the decision to return to Algolia. After a quick contracting process, Rugs.com was able to be up and running in less than a day, go live overnight and were already sending click & conversion events to Algolia.”
quotes.speaker: Grayson Bagwell
quotes.title: Director of E-Commerce & Business Development

quotes.text: “We have so many SKUs that discoverability of products can be difficult, so with Algolia we were better and more easily able to customize the search experience to help more items be more discoverable,”
quotes.speaker: Grayson Bagwell
quotes.title: Director of E-Commerce & Business Development

quotes.text: “The seamless ability to create rules became our favorite Algolia feature,” Bagwell admits, “because it let us boost different products and promote specific items or new collections.”
quotes.speaker: Grayson Bagwell
quotes.title: Director of E-Commerce & Business Development

quotes.text: “The support has been amazing from Algolia, who are always there when we need them”
quotes.speaker: Grayson Bagwell
quotes.title: Director of E-Commerce & Business Development

quotes.text: “Algolia is definitely one of the fastest performers and its ease of use, implementation and customer support exceeded our expectations,”
quotes.speaker: Grayson Bagwell
quotes.title: Director of E-Commerce & Business Development

quotes.text: "[Algolia] allowed WeWork to build our website without having to build out a backend.”
quotes.speaker: Fernando Padilla
quotes.title: Software Engineer

quotes.text: “Algolia has a nicely distributed search network, which makes it efficient, because it hits the closest Algolia index and makes it fast for our teams.”
quotes.speaker: Fernando Padilla
quotes.title: Software Engineer

quotes.text: “The ease of maintaining Algolia is extremely easy.”
quotes.speaker: Fernando Padilla
quotes.title: Software Engineer

quotes.text: “Algolia hasn’t needed a lot of customer support because it just works. And, when I have had questions about anything the team is quick to get back. It's been a positive experience.”
quotes.speaker: Fernando Padilla
quotes.title: Software Engineer

quotes.text: “It just works!... It’s stable, it does exactly what we want it to do. It’s doing a great job."
quotes.speaker: Fernando Padilla
quotes.title: Software Engineer

quotes.text: “The Algolia engine is so good that you see improvements across most important metrics. So, you get a better user experience, better usage of the customer's internet connection, better conversion on mobile. Also, the load on the website goes down a bit… It all adds up. It’s a great boon.”
quotes.speaker: Giuseppe Miriello
quotes.title: Global Digital Director

quotes.text: “Right out of the box, Algolia has good usability.”
quotes.speaker: Giuseppe Miriello
quotes.title: Global Digital Director

quotes.text: “Algolia allows for extreme flexibility in terms of catalog management: we have mostly automated it, except for specific items we are promoting in our newsletter, but they are few, to say the least. It makes keeping the visual merchandising aspect of the website seamless.”
quotes.speaker: Giuseppe Miriello
quotes.title: Global Digital Director

quotes.text: “Yes. You can use Algolia to increase sales, but our perspective has always been to use it to serve customers online a better experience with more relevant searches. The fact that I see the number of searches rising, tells me that our customers are enjoying the experience.”
quotes.speaker: Giuseppe Miriello
quotes.title: Global Digital Director

quotes.text: "Algolia brings a better experience in a segment where Magento doesn’t shine.”
quotes.speaker: Giuseppe Miriello
quotes.title: Global Digital Director

quotes.text: “Because we’re highly customized, we use Algolia like a SaaS (software as a service) that we build on, but with that said Algolia is so important to our tech stack and our performance metrics. We’ve seen conversion lift from Personalization and Search and Recommend, as well as reduced bounce rates from Recommend.”
quotes.speaker: Isaac Montaine
quotes.title: Vice-President, Product and SEO,

quotes.text: “What we wanted to do was create a better search experience than what we had at that time. We knew we’d be moving to Magento 2, and if we were going to change platforms, we needed a partner that was compatible with the platform.”
quotes.speaker: Isaac Montaine
quotes.title: Vice-President, Product and SEO,

quotes.text: “The most important part of providing a good search experience is making sure the product is working and when it’s not working finding out why. And that’s what led us to Algolia.”
quotes.speaker: Isaac Montaine
quotes.title: Vice-President, Product and SEO,

quotes.text: “We implemented Algolia for recommendations on all our product pages, so whether the product is in stock or not, we have created sections called ‘more choices’ and ‘you may also like.’ Those are all powered by Algolia Recommend.”
quotes.speaker: Isaac Montaine
quotes.title: Vice-President, Product and SEO,

quotes.text: “By far Algolia Instant Search has been the most beneficial to us. The ability for customers to get a preview of the items so they’re able to shop while typing in the search, plus being able to see recommendations (from Recommend), just leads to a better experience for the customer. They can get to the product much faster.”
quotes.speaker: Isaac Montaine
quotes.title: Vice-President, Product and SEO,

quotes.text: “I think about my business in terms of what’s better for my customers. And I know Algolia is better for my customers, so I want to have it in place. It’s the same with Shopify Plus, it’s more expensive, but I knew it was the best solution and I want to have the best solutions.”
quotes.speaker: Piotr Tuszewicki
quotes.title: Co-Founder

quotes.text: “We knew that Algolia was a really big investment for us but, for us, the quality was the most important thing, and Algolia is the best — one of the best — solutions. So, we adopted it and I really love it.”
quotes.speaker: Piotr Tuszewicki
quotes.title: Co-Founder

quotes.text: “Customer acquisition is really expensive. And once you spend that money it’s up to you to sell or not. I knew that once the customer hits that page they need to be served the best experience possible. So, Search is up front and a big part of our header, because we know it’s important.”
quotes.speaker: Piotr Tuszewicki
quotes.title: Co-Founder

quotes.text: “All we really had to do was change the URL, customize a couple of options and that was it.” Tuszewicki says Recommend is a crucial capability for the Noski Noski site because customers are unaware of many of the products available before visiting. “Algolia is great at this, so if a customer reaches a page and isn’t interested in what they see, the recommendation shows them something really relevant. The journey on the website is much richer.”
quotes.speaker: Piotr Tuszewicki
quotes.title: Co-Founder

quotes.text: “Just by looking at it, we knew Algolia’s recommendation API works better, and then we conducted A/B Testing and we saw after two or three weeks that the results are definitely better.”
quotes.speaker: Piotr Tuszewicki
quotes.title: Co-Founder

quotes.text: "Content discovery is an indespensible component of a knowledge base platform. Algolia's superior search technology helped our customers to bring relevant knowledge base articles in no time based on the search keywords."
quotes.speaker: Saravana Kumar
quotes.title: CEO

quotes.text: “First, it is extremely fast: super-fast with millisecond latency. Once content is indexed it’s available right away. The second reason is it’s extremely developer friendly. The developers know what to do. They can straight-away build it with Algolia APIs, which is not the case with Elasticsearch.”
quotes.speaker: Saravana Kumar
quotes.title: CEO

quotes.text: "Algolia definitely ended on top for a few reasons" "To summarize, ALgolia has greater ease-of-use and superior technology."
quotes.speaker: Saravana Kumar
quotes.title: CEO

quotes.text: "It took just one day to implement Algolia and one week to get the Document360 application - which was developed out of a hackathon - up and running."
quotes.speaker: Saravana Kumar
quotes.title: CEO

quotes.text: “Search plays a huge part in user experience,” Saravana says. “These days no one wants to have a hierarchical navigation to find content. You don’t go to a library and look for fiction section and then drill down to try to find the Game of Thrones novel. It’s not going to work. You go to the help desk tool and type in ‘game of thrones.’ and locate the book right away!”
quotes.speaker: Saravana Kumar
quotes.title: CEO

quotes.text: “Algolia’s AI capabilities play an important role in helping us leverage our technology to direct demand in specific ways, and that helps a lot in us finding ways to be a more profitable company — for a start-up like Sary this is crucial.”
quotes.speaker: Abdulaziz Binghannam
quotes.title: Head of Engineering

quotes.text: “We’ve had a lot of interactions with the Algolia customer support and technology support teams..Our experience has been exceptional. We have always received the answers we need, and promptly.”
quotes.speaker: Abdulaziz Binghannam
quotes.title: Head of Engineering

quotes.text: “There’s a more specialized problem that we were really struggling with using our pre-existing search capabilities, which was giving good results from Arabic keywords,” he says. “This was one of the biggest problems we had before, and we found that Algolia had phenomenal Arabic support. This gave us an immense uplift across the board for all our Arabic customers. We were blown away with how well Algolia solved it.”
quotes.speaker: Abdulaziz Binghannam
quotes.title: Head of Engineering

quotes.text: “We noticed a 500x improvement to search speed. When we switched to Algolia we were just blown away by how fast it was.”
quotes.speaker: Abdulaziz Binghannam
quotes.title: Head of Engineering

quotes.text: “I believe we’ve had a more fundamental, maybe cultural change at the organization since we implemented Algolia,” he says. “We found ourselves able to change, control and experiment with search and discovery in an effortless and immediate manner. This gave us a huge push when it comes to opening new venues — the ability to actually understand customer behavior and customize the experience for them.”
quotes.speaker: Abdulaziz Binghannam
quotes.title: Head of Engineering

quotes.text: "The bulk of our website traffic — about 70 - 80 percent of consumer traffic — comes from inspirational content. We didn’t have a good experience for people to search for recipes and crafts. The way Algolia works has really made a difference for people to find what they are looking for on our sites.”
quotes.speaker: Jamie Weaver
quotes.title: Digital Experience Lead

quotes.text: “I think we’ve grown leaps and bounds with Algolia. There's a lot of features that we still can tap into, which is great because I feel like we've gotten a ton out of it already.”
quotes.speaker: Geoff Lyman
quotes.title: Digital Experience Solutions Manager

quotes.text: Using A/B Testing around the customer journey with Recommend, Lyman found that its websites saw “stickiness rates increase dramatically; engagement rates were up, bounce rates were down.” “So, when we can add that to all of our products and recipe pages, and have it going automatically, it will provide scale and efficiency — helping us achieve our business goals.”
quotes.speaker: Geoff Lyman
quotes.title: Digital Experience Solutions Manager

quotes.text: “The way Algolia works has really made a difference for people to find what they are looking for on our sites,”
quotes.speaker: Jamie Weaver
quotes.title: Digital Experience Lead

quotes.text: “It was a giant step forward for us with our consumers that we can use images in search results,” she says. “The little things that we didn’t have before, even just the fact that it’s faster.”
quotes.speaker: Jamie Weaver
quotes.title: Digital Experience Lead

quotes.text: "We’ve been able to become more data-driven. Before we didn’t have any data, just complaints to work from. Now we can use the data from Algolia to really focus on the right KPIs,” Heydendael says. “I think that’s an asset. It sounds like a simple thing, but it really helps.”
quotes.speaker: Jeroen Heydendael
quotes.title: Director, Customer Experience

quotes.text: “We recognized we needed a new search solution, and not one where we’d have to hire a developer to configure it, because developers are scarce, expensive and would need to have a deep understanding of our business’s UX search experience,”
quotes.speaker: Jeroen Heydendael
quotes.title: Director, Customer Experience

quotes.text: “Implementation was fast and took place over two to three sprints; configuration and optimization took approximately six months but would have been much quicker,” Heydendael suggests; “we had multiple other issues with the digital transformation that required attention during that time.”
quotes.speaker: Jeroen Heydendael
quotes.title: Director, Customer Experience

quotes.text: The ease with which any “smart guy or girl” can manage and configure Algolia has empowered e-commerce and marketing professionals at Plieger, Heydendael suggests. “It’s important for us that someone pushing the buttons behind the scenes isn’t just an external developer but understands our business and our products and our clients.”
quotes.speaker: Jeroen Heydendael
quotes.title: Director, Customer Experience

quotes.text: “We’ve been able to become more data-driven. Before we didn’t have any data, just complaints to work from. Now we can use the data from Algolia to really focus on the right KPIs,” Heydendael says. “I think that’s an asset. It sounds like a simple thing, but it really helps.”
quotes.speaker: Jeroen Heydendael
quotes.title: Director, Customer Experience

quotes.text: Although the official language is Spanish, a lot of people speak a mixture of Spanish and English — Spanglish. Customers don't enter technical product descriptions when they do a search. Algolia helped us bridge the gap between the words that our category managers use and the actual terms that people enter into a search field when they look for a product. We love that kind of functionality.
quotes.speaker: Felipe Alonso Valverde
quotes.title: Head of E-Commerce

quotes.text: "Before we had Algolia, search was the major issue in the customer journey," Alonso notes. "At one point, we had a text box where people could describe what they wanted to buy. It didn't make life easy or efficient for our staff or customers."
quotes.speaker: Felipe Alonso Valverde
quotes.title: Head of E-Commerce

quotes.text: "Not only does Algolia pay for itself by enabling us to offer visibility to our CPGs, it also makes it easier for us to promote our higher-margin private label brands and include personalized impulse products on checkout."
quotes.speaker: Felipe Alonso Valverde
quotes.title: Head of E-Commerce

quotes.text: "In our business, I believe it's fundamental to have a great search experience, so shoppers can find exactly what they are looking for, and more." And the grocer is giving its customers more. With double the online market share of their closest competitor, automercado.cr is now Costa Rica’s leading online grocery and delivery platform.
quotes.speaker: Felipe Alonso Valverde
quotes.title: Head of E-Commerce

quotes.text: “Algolia was something we could put in place, make it meet our design, and then spend our development energy on gathering and organizing vendor data — which was itself a huge project.”
quotes.speaker: Stephen Burke
quotes.title: Senior Product Manager

quotes.text: “Obviously, there was development work, but we didn’t have to start from scratch with the shopping experience thanks to using Algolia InstantSearch and sensible defaults for a lot of pieces in it. Algolia was something we could just put in place, make it meet our design, and then spend our development energy on gathering and organizing vendor data — which was itself a huge project.”
quotes.speaker: Stephen Burke
quotes.title: Senior Product Manager

quotes.text: “The ability to infinitely customize things like ranking attributes has been essential, and was an important part of this for us,”
quotes.speaker: Stephen Burke
quotes.title: Senior Product Manager

quotes.text: “Algolia made the development process easier and made it so that we could actually launch this product, which was the most important thing,” Burke says. “But also, our engineers like working with Algolia, which makes a big difference.”
quotes.speaker: Stephen Burke
quotes.title: Senior Product Manager

quotes.text: “We had a search product that was difficult to manage from an engineer perspective — and from a product perspective as well. Making changes to it was really difficult for the engineering team. It was much more efficient to switch to Algolia, not just for the use of our time, but for the product itself.”
quotes.speaker: Steve Tiszenkel
quotes.title: Senior Product Manager

quotes.text: “It was a very manual process,” says Steve Tiszenkel. As Senior Product Manager of the Discover squad, Steve and his team are responsible for the search and browse experience on edx.org. “Elastic was more of a search product than a search platform,” he says. “We had to build everything ourselves. It didn’t make efficient use of our engineering and development time.”
quotes.speaker: Steve Tiszenkel
quotes.title: Senior Product Manager

quotes.text: “Rules helps us make sure we’re recommending the right product in the right circumstances. And AI Re-Ranking is the flip side of Rules. AI Re-ranking has been very, very helpful to us. We initially turned it on as a test and saw immediate benefits.”
quotes.speaker: Steve Tiszenkel
quotes.title: Senior Product Manager

quotes.text: “With a good vendor you’re not just paying for the product, you’re also getting consulting services. That shouldn’t be discounted. That’s a terrific benefit working with Algolia. I’m connected with them via Slack, and when anything comes up, they’re very much able to respond. When I have a great idea and bounce it off the team, they’ll often have an even better solution. It’s about the relationship, and the services, not just the software.”
quotes.speaker: Steve Tiszenkel
quotes.title: Senior Product Manager

quotes.text: Seeing that our Algolia-powered global search navigator is used 35 to 40 percent of the time is a clear indicator of the value of Search. It doesn’t have to be justified with sales because it’s a powerful solution. It creates a much better user experience by having a better search engine to find our site’s content.”
quotes.speaker: Theresa Kuske
quotes.title: Digital Marketing Director

quotes.text: “We have a small team, so doing it ourselves — configuring synonyms and doing the dev work to be able to create a really great search experience — wasn’t something we wanted to spend a ton of effort on, and then continually maintain.”
quotes.speaker: Theresa Kuske
quotes.title: Digital Marketing Director

quotes.text: “We really needed the fast-indexing operations and speed that Algolia has to serve the 500-plus levels of pricing we sometimes have for a single item,” Kuske said of the monumental tasks need for speed.
quotes.speaker: Theresa Kuske
quotes.title: Digital Marketing Director

quotes.text: “Instant Search itself is so fast and quick, there are other sales tools we’ve been discussing building out and utilizing Algolia Search to help our customers find.”
quotes.speaker: Theresa Kuske
quotes.title: Digital Marketing Director

quotes.text: “There are huge benefits we've found with Algolia. It moves some of the search infrastructure to a managed cloud service. It allows for quick basic implementations as well as ongoing iterations with more advanced feature sets, with limited code changes. And it has a great set of libraries, documentation, and hand-on support to launch a new search experience with confidence."
quotes.speaker: Mark Peter
quotes.title: Software Engineering Manager

quotes.text: “What keeps me up at night is part of our technology breaking down. That can happen for all kinds of reasons, which is the benefit of cloud services for basic architecture and SaaS. It becomes their responsibility,”
quotes.speaker: Mark Peter
quotes.title: Software Engineering Manager

quotes.text: “On the search engine side, with Elasticsearch, we’d have to have a team to run it, and this is extra overhead. And what happens if it fails for some reason? Who’s around to fix it?”
quotes.speaker: Mark Peter
quotes.title: Software Engineering Manager

quotes.text: “Elisabeth, our CSM, has been really great and hands-on. Weekly check-ins and having a technical person essentially on-call really helped with things like drilling down on specifics around how we wanted the index to work or finding some technical ‘gotchas’.... Algolia customer support is in general very good but having that extra level of feedback was great.”
quotes.speaker: Mark Peter
quotes.title: Software Engineering Manager

quotes.text: “Algolia has benefited us in not only making search results better and more relevant, but in understanding why they are more relevant and how to make items more prominent and search more helpful.”
quotes.speaker: Lauren Muir
quotes.title: Product Owner

quotes.text: "the tech and ecomm teams see the value of Algolia from the user perspective because we used to spend all day, every day on data collection using basically non-existent dashboards. Because Algolia data is very accessible through its dashboard, there are very clear reasons why things are ranked in the way that they are. It's given us a lot more intricate and detailed product data and information on search results."
quotes.speaker: Lauren Muir
quotes.title: Product Owner

quotes.text: "Algolia has benefited us in not only making search results better and more relevant, but in understanding why they are more relevant and how to make items more prominent and search more helpful.”
quotes.speaker: Lauren Muir
quotes.title: Product Owner

quotes.text: "it’s difficult to know how to improve those results and move the needle, but with Dynamic Re-Ranking on, it’s taking all the factors we’d consider. I don’t need to stress out and have e-comm check and double-check search term results and change rules. It’s a massive time saver.”
quotes.speaker: Lauren Muir
quotes.title: Product Owner

quotes.text: “You are the ‘set it and forget it’ of search. We set it up and it just works. It’s great!”
quotes.speaker: Josh Snow
quotes.title: Senior VP of Product and User Experience

quotes.text: “Algolia offered everything we needed, right out of the box. As NBC continues to shape the AVOD market, Algolia has helped us continue to provide the premium, high quality entertainment that viewers expect with zero interruption.”
quotes.speaker: Chris Elm
quotes.title: Director of Software Development

quotes.text: “All your AI features are easy to use. Point to one of the platforms and we can get it out in a matter of minutes.”
quotes.speaker: Chase Kaye
quotes.title: Senior Product Manager

quotes.text: "Since implementing Algolia’s Dynamic Re-ranking, NBC has seen conversion rate increase by 8.26%, media/episode consumption go up by 19.7%, average episodes watched per user increase by 19.7%, and engagement increase by 17.4%."
quotes.speaker: Chase Kaye
quotes.title: Senior Product Manager

quotes.text: "Elasticsearch requires a lot of technical knowledge, especially with the Query DSL. You really need to be an expert in Elasticsearch to tweak the algorithm. We tried many times to improve the relevance model and we barely moved the needle.”
quotes.speaker: Killian Saint cricq
quotes.title: Engineering Manager and Discovery & Engagement lead

quotes.text: “What I really like about Algolia is that we can run A/B tests with no code involved. From the dashboard we have been able to test AI-features such as Personalization and Dynamic Re-Ranking in only a few clicks. I’m able to do this really quickly and easily and I’m not a developer.”
quotes.speaker: Elvira Romashkina
quotes.title: Discovery & Engagement Product Manager

quotes.text: “The DevOps team won’t have to handle and monitor the servers (as it relates to search), we won't have to pay the AWS costs anymore, and we don't have to care about the infrastructure side of things. Search is just one less thing they have to do.”
quotes.speaker: Killian Saint cricq
quotes.title: Engineering Manager and Discovery & Engagement lead

quotes.text: “It’s not search that we’re experts in, and that’s why we decided to outsource this to those who are.”
quotes.speaker: Killian Saint cricq
quotes.title: Engineering Manager and Discovery & Engagement lead

quotes.text: "Algolia’s most valuable feature is their well documented API and React Widgets."
quotes.speaker: Daniel Olson
quotes.title: COO

quotes.text: "Algolia has improved our workflow and inspired us to develop more features using search."
quotes.speaker: Daniel Olson
quotes.title: COO

quotes.text: "It’s by far the best search as a service tool I’ve ever used. The developer experience is top notch and the experience we can deliver to our customers and users is everything we expected."
quotes.speaker: Daniel Olson
quotes.title: COO

quotes.text: "It’s by far the best search solution, and there’s so much more to explore."
quotes.speaker: Daniel Olson
quotes.title: COO

quotes.text: “The big advantage of Algolia is with a simple implementation of simple data we’ve been able to get very good results. Dynamic re-ranking has been a big part of that. We A/B tested it in the first couple weeks of launch and saw positive results. Really that has been a massive benefit for us. It saves a load of time that we don’t have to manually add rules, while providing a positive customer experience.”
quotes.speaker: Gareth Cotiss
quotes.title: E-Commerce Development Manager

quotes.text: “We knew search was the key issue on the site, and we wanted to resolve it quickly,” Cottiss says. “It was pretty clear fairly early on that Algolia would solve the problem.”
quotes.speaker: Gareth Cotiss
quotes.title: E-Commerce Development Manager

quotes.text: “As we were growing so fast, we wanted a simple implementation that would allow us quickly deliver an improved experience for our customers,” Cottiss says. Still even with a fast implementation and simple data feed, the results Co-op has seen from using Algolia Search and Recommend have been solid.
quotes.speaker: Gareth Cotiss
quotes.title: E-Commerce Development Manager

quotes.text: “The big advantage of Algolia is with a simple implementation we’ve been able to get very good results. Dynamic Re-ranking has been a big part of our growth. We A/B tested it in the first couple of weeks of launch and saw positive results. Really that has been a massive benefit for us. It saves a load of time that we don’t have to manually add rules while providing a positive customer experience.”
quotes.speaker: Gareth Cotiss
quotes.title: E-Commerce Development Manager

quotes.text: From a technical perspective, our existing search solution was part of a monolithic platform with limited extensibility. We were planning to further improve search and defined a four-step search pyramid — from technical base configuration to guided search to self-learning search, and ultimately to personalized search. We knew this would be hard to do with existing systems.”
quotes.speaker: Stephan Seitz
quotes.title: Head of Marketing & E-Commerce

quotes.text: “Business users value the possibility with Algolia to easily follow and understand how the ranking is generated and how it is impacted by their changes, including the relevancy, comprehensive sorting, accessibility of custom rankings, and many options they have to create and configure rules.”
quotes.speaker: Florian Plag
quotes.title: IT Consultant

quotes.text: “Developers found Algolia’s tutorials to be a great help, since it can be used as a blueprint, for example for sorting based on ranking or automatic boosting and generic rules,” Florian Plag says, adding that Algolia automatically recognizes relevant brands or categories in search terms and boosts them in results accordingly.
quotes.speaker: Florian Plag
quotes.title: IT Consultant

quotes.text: “We’ve tied Algolia to conduct A/B-Testing on various custom rankings,” he says. “We still do, and due to the configuration possibilities, there’s a lot of opportunity to fine-tune the base rankings according to our business rules.”
quotes.speaker: Heiner Eisenmann
quotes.title: E-Business Development

quotes.text: "We chose Algolia as our search and discovery solution because it's not just about finding products on the website; it's about quickly connecting the right product with the right customer, which we achieved using Algolia's advanced AI features. Algolia's Merchandising automation capabilities also allowed us to off-load efforts from brands, driving overall efficiency and higher website conversions."
quotes.speaker: Ankita Singh
quotes.title: CRO Manager

quotes.text: "We initially integrated Algolia on PLP and search pages, optimising results with custom ranking and sorting logics based on historical product data. As we fine-tuned our strategies through A/B testing, we transitioned to leveraging Algolia's AI features, including Dynamic Re-ranking, Personalization, and Query Categorization," Singh says. "We're now planning to test NeuralSearch and Algolia Recommend on our websites. With the upcoming website launch roadmap in place, we are pretty optimistic as it provides new growth opportunities.”
quotes.speaker: Ankita Singh
quotes.title: CRO Manager

quotes.text: "You can't control the content for a marketplace product in the same way you can for your own products. Sellers will sometimes write incorrect product descriptions & in many cases, they won't even bother to write one," Singh says. "Algolia enabled us to identify and address these problematic products, either by getting them fixed or finding our own solutions to deal with them."
quotes.speaker: Ankita Singh
quotes.title: CRO Manager

quotes.text: "Customers have a lot more choices now. Their expectation from a website is a higher level of customer experience — a better customer experience than we were giving before," says Singh. "That obviously leads to them wanting personalization and having better search. They should be able to find products, and navigation from one to another should be smooth."
quotes.speaker: Ankita Singh
quotes.title: CRO Manager

quotes.text: "Algolia gives me the ability to customize the user search experience without it being a 3-month project every time. Search, in my experience, is an ongoing process and you have to groom it. And, the fact that it’s relatively easy to do that is a game changer!”
quotes.speaker: Mike Drudzinski
quotes.title: Digital Product Management

quotes.text: “It’s been a good experience. We will continue to work together.”
quotes.speaker: Mike Drudzinski
quotes.title: Digital Product Management

quotes.text: "The results have been significant. In the last year we’ve had more than one million search results that have been clicked on, increasing the page views across multiple content/product categories. This has meant thousands of incremental orders… which translate to significant incremental revenue.”
quotes.speaker: Mike Drudzinski
quotes.title: Digital Product Management

quotes.text: “Algolia's powerful SaaS solution does the heavy lifting for our small development team. Indexing APIs and other functionalities come in handy when it comes to promo changes, price updates, and ranking. Also, Algolia's out-of-the-box UI integration provides a great base for developing complex UI use cases”
quotes.speaker: Hector Almaguer
quotes.title: CTO

quotes.text: “Every time we have a new promo or price change, doing it with Algolia saves a lot of time,” he says. “Everything we want to build on top of search would take us three to five times longer without the out-of-the-box implementations that Algolia provides, especially around search experience and UI.”
quotes.speaker: Hector Almaguer
quotes.title: CTO

quotes.text:
“Right now, with the current back-end infrastructure, we can  set up a new product in less than two hours. It has all the information, they can set pricing, and rules they want in combination with any attribute. We have coupons, catalog and cart price rules, upcharges, cost verification services, invoices, payments, credit memos, shipments, tracking, etc.”
“Basically, all the flexibility that Magento or Shopify Plus would have, but in our custom environment, plus supporting everything that’s customizable in the blind and shade business.”
quotes.speaker: Hector Almaguer
quotes.title: CTO

quotes.text: "Search at flaconi is powered by Algolia, and is a key feature that helps our customers find the products they are looking for quickly and seamlessly across both our website and mobile app. Moreover, Algolia's user-friendly backoffice dashboard provides additional features such as pinning products, defining rules, and running A/B tests, this empowers our business users to test their hypotheses without the need for engineering support and improves time to market”
quotes.speaker: Adeel Younas
quotes.title: Head of Engineering

quotes.text: “Our main reason to go with Algolia was Search. We use Algolia to power our search, and it’s very crucial since it’s a key feature we provide on the website and app that helps our customers to find the right products for them. Other features that add on to Search—like the pinning of products, custom rules and dynamic re-ranking that helps our internal stakeholder test different hypotheses without any dependencies on tech — all come together very well and give us a lot of flexibility and opportunity.”
quotes.speaker: Adeel Younas
quotes.title: Head of Engineering

quotes.text: “Now the engineers are happier, building a Search feature that they can see live on the site, with a visible outcome that you can relate to and feel proud of.”
quotes.speaker: Adeel Younas
quotes.title: Head of Engineering

quotes.text: "The customer experience Algolia Search delivers is really very high and we wanted to have that kind of experience on our websites.”

quotes.text: “With our previous search engine, we had to spend so many days and hours to set it up to reach a good user experience. Despite this, it was not at the level needed, and I knew that if we wanted to continue to work with it, I would need to hire for new competencies and invest a lot.”
quotes.speaker: Benjamin Guerry
quotes.title: Digital Business Solution Leader

quotes.text: “I’d prefer to pay for an Algolia license and use a good solution out-of-the-box that is easy to use with little configuration. The customer experience Algolia Search delivers is really very high and we wanted to have that kind of experience on our websites.”
quotes.speaker: Benjamin Guerry
quotes.title: Digital Business Solution Leader

quotes.text: “Algolia provides us with a lot of value. It makes the listings of products easier. It’s also good for user behavior, because we can adapt the search bar to match their behavior. It’s even more important depending on the type of clients. We know on mobile it’s very important because they must rely on the search bar more often.”

quotes.title: Product Owner

quotes.text: “The AI Synonym feature has been very good for us, because we have a lot of technical products that have different words for them,” Sanchez says. “But also, there are a lot of parts that are very close but are not synonyms, so this feature has been a good improvement for us.”

quotes.text: “Algolia provides us with a lot of value. It makes the listings of products easier. quotes.text: “In today’s competitive climate, it’s more important than ever for retailers to have the tools needed to meet customer expectations. What our customers want today might be different tomorrow, and that’s the level of speed that Algolia provides. Algolia’s efficiency has led to increased conversion rates, higher revenue, and better overall experience.”

quotes.title: Director of E-Commerce

quotes.text: For example, when summer rolls around the merchandising team can easily lead with sandals or running shoes, while pushing back boots from results. “Even those kinds of changes used to require more teams to be involved. Now, we just see a need, we see what the customer is asking for, and we quickly react to it,” Grisham says.

quotes.text: Again, Algolia’s ease and speed around making changes were assets. quotes.title: Director of E-Commerce

quotes.text: “When we did two searches, one using Algolia Search and the other using Elasticsearch, which of the two results was more accurate? Around 90 percent of the time Algolia was better. quotes.text: “[Algolia] is really fast. The search results are within 36 milliseconds. quotes.text: “The Reranking I like, because our product listings are re-ranked based on Search and behavior from our customers. quotes.title: E-Commerce Manager

quotes.text: “When our customers search for something, they are getting the right results thanks to the strength of Algolia’s engine.”

quotes.title: E-Commerce Manager

quotes.text: The main problem we have experienced is typos in search term queries made by users visiting our online store. Algolia addresses this problem with its best in class typo tolerance. This prevents a search result with no products for the end user and leads to an increase in conversions for our online store. In our organization we also started to use Algolia for personalized search results based on a users past search and click behaviour to tailor the results according to his preferences. This leads to a better customer experience overall.

quotes.text: We've frequently encountered issues with typos in search queries made by users on our online store. Algolia solves this with its top-tier typo tolerance, ensuring users aren't met with empty search results, which ultimately boosts conversions.

quotes.text: “We wanted to move from two search engines to one, and it had to be performant. We wanted the results pages to be served up very quickly. quotes.title: CTO

quotes.text:
“Because of the complexities of eyewear variations, getting synonyms right is extremely difficult,” Ting adds. For example, there are people who call clear frames — what we call translucent color — white. Having those searches added and relevance scored would be huge for us, because manually managing it across a large multilingual SKU is extremely challenging.”
“That’s why we’re looking at Neural Search to simplify and calculate those synonyms in a relevant way that improves automatically with user input. We’re testing it, and very excited about not having to manually manage all that.”
quotes.speaker: David Ting
quotes.title: CTO

quotes.text: “We’re working a lot on the personalization side and improving relevance rankings because of nuances around glasses, but performance is the top feature. If it works as advertised, then Neural Search will be the new killer feature beyond Algolia’s strength in reliability.”
quotes.speaker: David Ting
quotes.title: CTO

"With Algolia, we have more flexibility,” Dahl says. That’s critical, he adds, in an industry where “many customers don’t understand item numbers,” which can make it difficult to search for the specific products they need.

"Algolia helped bring value to CarExpert in three key ways: A vastly improved search experience over our existing solution, the ability for our development team to focus on other critical work, and a stronger competitive edge.

Improved Search: We were a greenfield website. Temporarily, we had a Wordpress MVP site that was never intended to last very long. The search ability of Algolia has far exceeded the Wordpress search we had.

Decreased or deferred staffing costs: Algolia has also meant we haven’t had to look at hiring staff geared primarily towards search infrastructure as an urgent priority and can have our team working on other priorities for the business.

Competitive advantage: It has given us a feature that our competitor’s websites either don’t have or haven’t implemented well, and we feel like we’ve just scratched the surface of what we could do with Algolia."

quotes.title: CTO

quotes.text: As software developers, we are often called upon to develop web applications that offer enterprise-grade search experiences, with analytics and all the bells and whistles. Fortunately, Algolia makes this a snap.

quotes.title: Senior Consultant / Founder

quotes.speaker: Fedor Tyurin
quotes.title: CTO (Chief Technical Officer)

quotes.text:
Best in class Search experience
"Algolia is a robust and extremely efficient search tool. The dedication and availability of senior engineers and product owners is essential and makes Algolia best in class i technology as well as services"
"Algolia offers fast and efficient search with good control on recall and great accuracy. The rules are a combination of dynamic and flexible options to optimize results. Algolia works well in merchandising too. We use Algolia across dozens of ecommerce sites and Apps, within different categories from Grocery to Furniture, Fashion and Beauty."
quotes.speaker: Eric Meulien
quotes.title: Global manager, Retail

quotes.text:
Well worth the investment
We have improved our site search results and what is being delivered to our customers. Also, their customer support is fantastic and there are a number of features that bring the platform to life.
With our former search solution, we weren't able to pull in the deep levels of attributes that we now have with Algolia. That has been extremely helpful.
quotes.speaker: Bob Toeppner
quotes.title: E-commerce manager

quotes.text:
Algolia is great for all E-commerce websites big or small
We use Algolia to provide a better shopping experience on our BigCommerce website. The out of the box site search on BigCommerce does not meet our standard needs. We use Algolia for advanced product filtering and product search. It allows us to curate the right products to the right customers based on their search and needs.

Algolia has been a game changer for us. It provides A LOT of value for a great price point. As our site grows Algolia grows with us and offers flexible plans. Definitely appropriate for small to large businesses. I have zero negative points about this tool. I recommend it for everyone especially BigCommerce users. It does have a bit of a learning curve
quotes.speaker: Sarah Goodfellow
quotes.title: Web Developer

quotes.text:
A helpful platform that makes search easy and saves time
Algolia takes a load off our plate and frees our engineers to work on bigger problems vs minute search changes or monitoring. It also empowers our product teams to directly use the AI to make basic changes and see analytics in one easy place. We chose Algolia to increase development velocity and reduce the hidden costs of maintaining and operating open-source code/search tools.

I'd definitely recommend Algolia for a business operating in the ecommerce space and looking to integrate search quickly. Using the tool is easy to set up and works well. Out of the box you can have search, autocomplete, and recommendations that are all integrated. If you integrate directly, Algolia works well for also using their internal A/B test system.
quotes.speaker: Will Essilfie
quotes.title: Product Manager

quotes.text:
"Powerful and Fast Search Engine"
What do you like best about Algolia?
Using Algolia has made our app’s search feature super quick and much easier to manage.s a developer, I really liked the flexibility it gives with custom ranking, filters, and the relevance tuning. Integration with React was smooth, and the InstantSearch components saved us a lot of time.
Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.

What do you dislike about Algolia?
The pricing can be a bit steep, especially if your dataset is large or if you have a lot of search traffic.
Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.

What problems is Algolia solving and how is that benefiting you?
We didn’t have to build a search engine from scratch — just push data to Algolia, and it’s ready to go. Their analytics and dashboard are quite helpful for monitoring
quotes.speaker: Arun P
quotes.title: Assistant Director

quotes.text:
"A goldmine of AI based searches! Superbly useful!"
What do you like best about Algolia?
Their AI Browse feature is a game changer. The usability is simple and sharp and overall UX is curated for ease. One can easily create category pages without any coding knowledge which is worth praising.
Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.

What do you dislike about Algolia?
Nothing as of now. But a small point, while exploring the platform I found a glitch while pining the hero product on the top. Not sure it was my browser but was not a major trouble!
Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.

What problems is Algolia solving and how is that benefiting you?
The best thing about Algolia is that it's an all-in-one platform for E-commerce enthusiasts. Whether you want to research about the user needs or create category pages with drag and drop features to analytics of each page at one single place, Algolia does it all!
quotes.speaker: simrandeep S.
quotes.title: Digital Marketing Manager

quotes.text:
"Best Search Optimization Tool"
What do you like best about Algolia?
1. Managing user search data easily and optimizing it to provide accurate results.

2. Recommend users with the exact similar products they are searching for.

3. User search analytics that gives in depth information about the products viewed and clicked for a specific time.
Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.

What do you dislike about Algolia?
Nothing as such but the implementation docs and examples need to be updated and should be easily understandable. Also pricing should be lower for first year of use
Review collected by and hosted on G2.com.

What problems is Algolia solving and how is that benefiting you?
Algolia provides ability to query search results in few secs as compared to earlier elastic search. The algolia dashboard makes it efficient to manage how the search results are displayed and ordered with respect to specific query rules. Also it gives detailed analytics about the users search query and provides accurate output.
